section.27: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives

hadiths.text: Abu Dharr narrated that the Messenger of Allah said :"Allah has made some of your brothers as slaves under your care. So whoever has his brother under his care, then let him feed him from his food, and let him clothe him from his clothes. And do not give him a duty that he cannot bear, and if you give him a duty he cannot bear, then assist him with it
